description: Let S denote the palindromes in the language {0,1,2}*; a(n) = number of words of length n in the language SS.
references: R. Kemp, On the number of words in the language {w in Sigma* | w = w^R }^2, Discrete Math., 40 (1982), 225-234.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_, R. Kemp
extensions: Entry revised by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 07 2011
